features: Virtual DJ decks: Dual deck interface for mixing and beatmatching tracks in real-time.
Real-time collaboration: Multiple users can DJ together with synchronized playback and controls.
Audio library: Upload and organize music tracks for mixing sessions.
Crossfader control: Smooth transitions between tracks with adjustable crossfade curves.
BPM detection: Automatic tempo analysis helps match beats between tracks.
Waveform display: Visual representation of audio helps identify breaks, drops, and transitions.
Cue points: Set markers in tracks for quick navigation and precise mixing.
Effects processing: Apply filters, delays, and other effects to enhance mixes.
Live streaming: Broadcast DJ sessions to listeners via web audio streaming.
Session recording: Capture mixes for playback, sharing, or archival purposes.
Web-based interface: No software installation required, works in any modern browser.
Low latency: Optimized audio engine provides responsive controls for live mixing.
